summary: The Fairness in Fentanyl Sentencing Act of 2025 aims to modify federal offenses related to fentanyl. It amends the Controlled Substances Act and the Controlled Substances Import and Export Act, reducing sentencing thresholds for fentanyl analogues. The bill also directs the U.S. Sentencing Commission to review and amend sentencing guidelines accordingly. Additionally, it mandates the Postmaster General to increase use of chemical screening devices and dedicate personnel to interdict fentanyl and other substances illegally imported through the mail.
